author: cnbc.com
title: Pfenex posts 4Q profit
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Pfenex Inc. (PFNX) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter net income of $5.5 million, after reporting a loss in the same period a year earlier.
The San Diego-based company said it had net income of 23 cents per share.
The biotechnology company posted revenue of $17.9 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported a loss of $25.7 million, or $1.09 per share, swinging to a loss in the period. Revenue was reported as $28.8 million.
Pfenex shares have increased 92 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $5.10, a drop of 26 percent in the last 12 months.
